Content.motto1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
Content.motto2: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin
Content.motto3: Every failure is a new beginning

readingContent: Literary Classics - "One Hundred Years of Solitude", "Dream of the Red Chamber"
Historical Biography - "Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind"
travelContent: Natural Scenery - Hiking in snow mountains, exploring forests
Urban Culture - Tasting cuisine, visiting museums
Photography - Capturing beautiful moments during journeys
Cultural Exchange - Learning about different regional cultures and histories
LeftItem.description: Everyone's interests and hobbies are unique, they shape our personalities and worldviews. I believe maintaining curiosity and an open mind, constantly exploring new things, is the best way to enrich life.

RightItem.description: In addition to reading and traveling, I have many other hobbies. These activities allow me to relax, cultivate creativity, and make many like-minded friends.
musicContent: Pop Music - Independent bands, original soundtracks
Musical Instruments - Self-learning guitar and piano
Live Performances - Attending music festivals and concerts
sportsContent: Running - Morning runs and marathon training
Yoga - Maintaining physical and mental balance
Mountaineering - Challenging myself, enjoying beautiful scenery

JavaScript.description: Core programming language for web front-end development, used to implement page interaction logic and dynamic effects, and also supports server-side development.

CSS.description: Cascading Style Sheets, used to define the visual style and layout of web pages, and also supports responsive design.

HTML.name: HTML
HTML.description: HyperText Markup Language, the foundation for building web page structures.

React.description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces, focused on component-based development and virtual DOM.

Vue.description: Progressive JavaScript framework, easy to learn and powerful.

NextJS.description: Full-stack framework based on React, supporting server-side rendering and static site generation.

NodeJS.description: JavaScript runtime environment based on Chrome V8 engine, used for server-side development.

Webpack.description: Static module bundler for modern JavaScript applications.

Vite.description: Next-generation front-end build tool, providing extremely fast development experience.

Babel.description: JavaScript compiler for converting ES6+ code to backward-compatible versions.

ESLint.description: JavaScript code checking tool used to identify and fix problems in code.

Prettier.description: Code formatting tool to ensure code style consistency.

PostCSS.description: Tool for transforming CSS with JavaScript, providing modern CSS feature support.

AnimationLib.name: Animation Libraries
AnimationLib.description: Libraries for implementing page animation effects

UniApp.description: Framework for developing cross-platform applications using Vue.js.

Git.description: Distributed version control system for code management and collaborative development.

Network.name: Computer Network
Network.description: Basic knowledge of computer networks, including HTTP, TCP/IP and other protocols.
